categories: Category:Imperial Navy officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Esture was a a male Human Lieutenant who was stationed on the Death Star.

In 0 BBY, Esture was stationed on the first Death Star where he checked on the droid P-RC3, who had a memory breakdown during the Battle of Yavin. Looking for the owner of the droids, he wanted to talk over this incident. This, however, reported having "air" because he had to cover an escape attempt during the battle. Esture assumed to have the connection wrong and apologized until the Death Star was destroyed.
